author: GameSpot
description:
Email your letters to gotchacovered@gamespot.com

Check out the audio version:
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/4S5mfmLES0ubhj5xcDZJni
RSS Feed: https://www.spreaker.com/show/6752166/episodes/feed

It WAS a slow news week here on Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered but then a little game called GTA 6 got delayed, so we had to rush back in the studio to give you our hot take on the bombshell announcement. But that's not all! Stick around for another great episode where Kurt and Lucy speedrun indie game recommendations, try and guess if some ridiculous unused voice lines from MLB Slugfest 2003 are real, complain about stick clicks, and more!

15:35 - Graphics, Story, or Mechanics?

31:41 - Can gaming peripherals have a comeback?
38:15 - Beef of the Week: Stick Clicks
42:04 - Non-Gaming
title: GTA 6 Delayed… Now What? | Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered
